Root.TestCase:
create materialized view m1 as select v1, v2 from t1 where v1 = 1;
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[m1]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[=($0, 1)]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, t1]], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2]])
>
[2]

create materialized view m2 as select v1, v2 from t1 where v2 = 1;
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[m2]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[=($1, 1)]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, t1]], tableId=[0.0.1], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.1.0, 0.0.1.1, 0.0.1.2]])
>
[2]

create materialized view m3 as select sum(M1.v1) as sum_m1_v1, sum(m1.v2) as sum_m1_v2 from m1;
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[m3]) RwStreamProject(sum_m1_v1=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $1)], sum_m1_v2=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $2)], $f0=[$0], sum_m1_v1_copy=[$1], sum_m1_v2_copy=[$2]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[COUNT()], sum_m1_v1=[SUM($0)], sum_m1_v2=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.4], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.4.0, 0.0.4.1, 0.0.4.2]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, m1]], tableId=[0.0.4], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.4.0, 0.0.4.1, 0.0.4.2]])
>
[2, 3, 4]

create materialized view m4 as select m1.v1, m1.v2, m2.v1, m2.v2 from m1 join m2 on m1.v1 = m2.v1;
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[m4]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.4], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.4.0, 0.0.4.1, 0.0.4.2]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, m1]], tableId=[0.0.4], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.4.0, 0.0.4.1, 0.0.4.2]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.5], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.5.0, 0.0.5.1, 0.0.5.2]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, m2]], tableId=[0.0.5], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.5.0, 0.0.5.1, 0.0.5.2]])
>
[2, 5]

create materialized view m5 as select v2, v3, v1 from t2;
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[m5]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t2]], columns=[v2,v3,v1,_row_id])
>
[3]

create materialized view m6 as select sum(v1) as sum_v1, avg(v3) as avg_v3 from m5 group by v1;
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[m6]) RwStreamProject(sum_v1=[$2], avg_v3=[/(CAST($3):DOUBLE NOT NULL, $4)], v1=[$0]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], sum_v1=[SUM($0)], agg#2=[SUM($1)], agg#3=[COUNT($1)]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.8], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.8.2, 0.0.8.1, 0.0.8.3]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, m5]], tableId=[0.0.8], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.8.2, 0.0.8.1, 0.0.8.3]])
>
[2]

create materialized view m7 as select sum(v1) as sum_v1 from m5 group by v2;
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[m7]) RwStreamProject(sum_v1=[$2], v2=[$0]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], sum_v1=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.8], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.8.0, 0.0.8.2, 0.0.8.3]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, m5]], tableId=[0.0.8], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.8.0, 0.0.8.2, 0.0.8.3]])
>
[1]

create materialized view m8 as select v1, v2, v3 from t2;
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[m8]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t2]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])
>
[3]

create materialized view m9 as select round(avg(v1), 1) as avg_v1, sum(v2) as sum_v2, count(v3) as count_v3 from m8;
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[m9]) RwStreamProject(avg_v1=[ROUND($STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, /(CAST($1):DOUBLE, $2)), 1)], sum_v2=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $3)], count_v3=[$0], $f1=[$1], $f2=[$2], sum_v2_copy=[$3]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[SUM($0)], agg#2=[COUNT($0)], sum_v2=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamChain(all=[true], tableId=[0.0.11], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.11.0, 0.0.11.1, 0.0.11.3]]) RwStreamBatchPlan(table=[[test_schema, m8]], tableId=[0.0.11], primaryKeyIndices=[[2]], columnIds=[[0.0.11.0, 0.0.11.1, 0.0.11.3]])
>
